text:
[Verse]
Daylight slipping through
We climb so high up
City lights below
Nobody can stop us

[Verse 2]
Rhythm in our hearts
Sky turns into stars
Feel the world expand
Dancing hand in hand

[Chorus]
Dancing on the roof
Feel the wind in our hair
Dancing on the roof
Got no worries no cares

[Verse 3]
Music in the air
We laugh and we sing
Jumping to the beat
Feel the joy it brings

[Chorus]
Dancing on the roof
Feel the wind in our hair
Dancing on the roof
Got no worries no cares

[Bridge]
Midnight's almost here
But we don’t feel the fear
Underneath the sky
We can touch the night
title: Dancing on the Roof
